website_summaries.verdict: Not as powerful as a jug blender, but this nifty immersion model can hold its own and offers exceptional value for money.
pros: Its quiet, yet relatively powerful, motor can crush and blend most ingredients
Comes with a 3-cup blending jar that can also be used to store foods in
Removable shaft makes for easy cleanup
cons: Not powerful enough for heavy duty tasks, such as making nut butters

customer_reviews.title: Motor Broke after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: My first one lasted 4/5 years, and this last one lasted only 9 months. The motor burnt out, which is really disappointing. I love the product but am disappointed in the short life. Going to try a different brand next.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My first negative review ever: Don’t buy this. Mine may have been a returned product
customer_reviews.text: It’s the worst. I was hoping it would replace my Cuisinart hand blender that has been remodeled in such a way, it’s hard to use. The hand blender literally unscrews and comes apart when we use it, and it actually hurts to keep the power button compressed. I wish I had not waited so long to open the box and use it or it would have gone straight back. Mine actually appeared to be used when I opened the package. There are no instructions and the very nice jar did not have a top. Perhaps it was a returned product? Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ceewee

customer_reviews.title: and toaster all of which I like, and I thought I would like this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a Kitchen Aid stand mixer, food processor, and toaster all of which I like, and I thought I would like this product too. I formerly owned a Cuisenart (sp?) hand blender. This Kitchen Aid is harder to click lock assemble for use. I also expected a metal blender head from Kitchen Aid, but it's plastic. So far it works good, not the performance I dislike, just the engineering. I'm a small, 60 yr old woman. This device is difficult for me to assemble and disassemble each use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Vergin

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid Hand Blender
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender two years ago and have used it no more than 5 times. Today I needed to use it and it will not start. Very disappointing. Poor quality and design all the way around. If I could give it no stars for a review I would.
customer_reviews.author: jill bisho

customer_reviews.title: If your older like me and need reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: It kept falling off until I realized there was a line on the hand blender to show if it’s locked. If your older like me and need reading glasses, you might not have noticed it. Just twist it til it lines up and locks. I don’t have too much use for this though. I got it to blend coffee with coconut oil. It didn’t work out as well as I hoped and I find it easier to use the ninja blender. Still this will help with mashed potatoes and blending soups in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: MsHatch20

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work that well and is lower quality than others
customer_reviews.text: I had a Braun for 10+ years and it finally gave way. It worked great. This KitchenAid seems like its lower quality. As an example when putting the attachment on, it doesn't seem secure and there isn't a "click" that indicates that its on (like the Braun does). It even came off once when I was using it. I also use these hand mixers to make smoothies and I use a frozen banana, but it didn't fully liquefy the banana and I had odd frozen chunks of banana. I suppose its cheap enough to overlook some of these issues, but now I think maybe I should have paid more for something better.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott Son

customer_reviews.title: Soup’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: I love my immersion blender! It makes making soup a simple dream. Gone are the days of spooning portions into the blender! It takes just a couple minutes to completely blend a full crockpot of soup. BUT that said, don’t forget to take out your bay leaves before you start blending or they’ll be chopped into tiny tiny impossible to find pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Terrible power and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Kitchenaid Immersion blender. I bought it because I love my first one, which still works except the blade broke and I was unable to find just a replacement blade. This mixer has terrible power and the vibration of the mixer makes it come detached constantly when in use. I’m frustrated every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Super useful, a must-have kitchen product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I love to cook but did not want to clean the massive blender everytime I blend/grind something. This product changed my life..no more blenders in my kitchen. Use it to make chutneys, sauces, smoothies, purees, and even in-the-pot soups and curries (since this is made of stainless steel and can be used directly in the pot on the stove). HIghly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dhindhin

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found that I was using this mixer more than the new Vitamix blender we just splurged on. We actually sent the Vitamix back and are using this for our smoothies, sauces and dressings. I love how easy this mixer is to use and clean. And I really love how small and easy to store this is. It's great to not have that huge Vitamix hogging up space on our counter! I only wish that we got the nicer version of this mixer, as it can be used with other mixing attachments that this one isn't compatible with.
customer_reviews.author: VRex

customer_reviews.title: Dexterity
customer_reviews.text: Left handed need not apply. Must hold lock button at top and squeeze power at handle. It should stay on after safety lock is engaged. It didn’t always give me more than five seconds of stirring. Coordination is difficult. Found less powerful and because I couldn’t engage for proper mixing I didn’t get smooth enough results.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Magic Bullet w/this Hand Blender (it had gotten so loud over the years and started leaking). I have several KitchenAid products and love them, so I thought I'd give this one a try. My kids LOVE making fruit smoothies and milk shakes, so this was the perfect product. I love that it is so quiet and it gets the job done.!!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Quality better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Mmmmm.... I don't know about food, but I got this for easy protein shake mixing. It's great for that and even mixing in a banana. To be honest, it's a bit too much. I coulda bought something simpler. 😄 It's like bringing a gun to a knife fight for protein shakes. But, the cup and lid that comes with it are awesome to premake them and put em in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: saltlakedave

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but can be hard to disassemble.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is silent and blends really well. The cord is very durable and overall construction is sound, but functionality is lacking a bit. I’m a decently strong guy and sometimes I can barely take it apart to clean. My hands can’t be wet and I have to use a towel. Maybe mine was built a little tighter than others? Overall a great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dale Beard

customer_reviews.title: Very underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Bought this handheld blender with the sole purpose of blending some of that Costco peanut butter and it failed. The blender was stuck multiple times making a 1 minute long task to take over 10.
customer_reviews.author: datguenvy

customer_reviews.title: Something any kitchen should have
customer_reviews.text: It's a Monster. I'm a Chef by trade and my old blender burned up after 7years of my abuse. I use this at work when I need to mince Garlic, Shallots or Ginger. I also use it to smooth out Soups and Sauces.
customer_reviews.author: retchef

customer_reviews.title: Thor’s hammer for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mixing stubborn protein shakes and it does a fantastic job. This replaced a Chinese battery powered mixer and is much more powerful. This creates such a strong vortex that it picks up the cup by some physics bending phenomena.
customer_reviews.author: andthentheend

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Connection = Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This item is worthless. The connection between the motor and the blender is plastic. It broke on the first use. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: LAV

customer_reviews.title: easily falls when setting it down
customer_reviews.text: Top heavy, easily falls when setting it down. To me it does not blend nearly as well as my previous Calphalon imersion blender. The container is thin walled and deforms, a problem with the not so tight lid, allowing it to pop off and spill the contents.right onto the car floor board. also the container shows milimeter readings, cups but not ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Bodine

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. So easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased similar device at local Bed Bath and Beyond some years ago. Eventually work out. Purchased a similar product (tho different) from Amazon but returned it because the forced position of my hand to operate was awkward. This is perfect. So easy....does not create air bubbles in my morning Smoothie so no 'runovers' in my large Smoothie Cup. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Orindagirl

customer_reviews.title: Maybe worth investing in a better one
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend as she wanted one and I saw that this was easy to use and generally had good reviews. When she used it initially, it worked out overall well. However, the more she used it, it seemed that the blades were dulling or at least not blending things well, especially spinach. It had a lot of difficulty with fibrous frozen fruits too. Now the most recently complaint is that the blending portion doesn't lock into the motor portion and comes undone very easily. The motor vibrations also hurt my girlfriend's hands after a while because of how long it took to blend the fruits and veggies. My thoughts...invest in another nicer blender.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: the overall product is great
customer_reviews.text: The blending power is not as strong as I thought but it is ok, I guess huge chunks might be a problem but I haven't tried it yet like that, you need to press the power bottom the whole time if you want it to work, there is no one time press kinda bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Great For Making Baby Food!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to use for his new baby. He loves it! It's more powerful than the one I have and blends food smoother but has a lower speed to blend food for toddlers. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great hand blender
customer_reviews.text: Great hand blender. I wish the picture had been more clear, as there is a cord attached. I've been using it for months with no issue. Makes homemade mayonnaise so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: great quality immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: Was a replacement for a different immersion blender that previously failed. I love the 2 speed function. The only complaint is how the bottom attaches to the top. It doesn't always lock easily for me. Otherwise, great quality you'd expect from kitchenaid.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle CVMA

customer_reviews.title: Defect, never used
customer_reviews.text: I bought two identical units, one working perfectly and meeting the expectations, the other does not turn on, does not work and does not make noise. It's defective and I could never use it. I hope the supplier has a solution, because I live in Brazil and will not travel more this year. No support for the problem...
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Renan Seuanes Machado

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve contemplated getting a hand blender for as long as I can remember - what was I waiting for??? I finally decided to get one to add to my kitchen collection and I love having this hand blender around to help me with my cooking. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bulldoggie04

customer_reviews.title: Same day delivery is awesome! The plastic container not some much.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered and received this today. The blender works great but the plastic container arrived cracked in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Larussa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't arrive with pot protector attachment
customer_reviews.text: This unit is supposed to have a pot protector attachment to keep pots from getting scratched when blending. Mine was missing and I'd like Kitchen Aid to send me a new one, since I've already paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Dee

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Purées fruits and vegetables very well, I use it to make baby food. Does a great job regardless of the amount being prepared. The plastic cup that is included with the purchase is very helpful in that it works well with the size of the blender, and is very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kbull

customer_reviews.title: not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: third purchase of a hand blender, this one is a bit loose when you attach the wand/blade. older ones seemed more sturdy. i had hoped this brand would be much higher quality. i guess appliances in general are not super solid anymore.
customer_reviews.author: C. st Jean

customer_reviews.title: love it. had it for a year now
customer_reviews.text: love it. had it for a year now, never had problems with it. I am a home cook, I use it once a week when I make soup.The soup always comes our great.
customer_reviews.author: toni_sto

customer_reviews.title: kitchenaid brand lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: not much to say on this review other than don't bother with the lesser known brands. i got the blender on sale which was comparably priced to the lower tiers and this one didn't blow the fuse while i was making cream of mushroom soup (like the bella blender did-at least i got to finish the soup before i returned it).
customer_reviews.author: Odd Fellow Amerigo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful quick and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily to make mashed potatoes alternatives right in the pot like call Robbie and mashed cauliflower it works quickly and evenly and cleans up nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mark CHI

customer_reviews.title: Detaches
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple minutes of starting to blend anything, the bottom part unscrews itself and detaches. Does not lock securely when you attach the two pieces. Blending itself seemed pretty effective, just a total design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Shull

customer_reviews.title: Great bender but I thought it had a on or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bender but I thought it had a on or off button, you have to hold down the button while using which can make mixing ingredients for soap a bit tedious and hard on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: The blending arm works itself loose when you’re blending. My cheap Hamilton Beach immersion blender has never done that in 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific machine. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific machine. Very easy to use, rather quiet (compared to a full-size blender) and easy to clean. Whips up protein shakes easily and in no time flat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love it especially for milkshakes. My favorite is that it can be put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This blender does not stay together when in use. I have to hold the 2 pieces together or the bottom falls off the top part. Not an item I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law and she absolutely loves it! There's no higher praise than that!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Hummel

customer_reviews.title: I'm rather disappointed in this hand blender
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather disappointed in this hand blender. The blending attachment keeps falling off as I blend. It does not have a secure connection to the motor part. Also, it does not seem to have much power. I've had other hand blenders that I've loved, and this one can't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Detachable blades make cleaning so easy!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish the emersion blender had would be 2 speeds. Sometimes you don't need that much power...can that be possible? I made an omelet and it turned out great, but if you don't put the blender all the way down into the container, the contents splurt all over the place. Thus the term "have egg on your face"! The detachable handle is a Godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Reager

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to correctly attach blade unit.
customer_reviews.text: It is quite difficult to get the blade unit to stay attached during blending.
customer_reviews.author: SmellyDogsMom

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Came missing a part, the pan guard. Is it possible to get that piece sent to me?
customer_reviews.author: mileen a gilkey

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my last one...which burned up when plugged into the wrong voltage... oops. Handy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Supremely...

customer_reviews.title: Amazing😻
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who is a chef, and he loves it. He’s been making delicious sauces. So happy we purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: Grecia Amparo-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Old plastic Braun finally gave out. This is an upgrade replacement. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Barber

customer_reviews.title: Blending arm comes apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: The "Blending Arm", which has the blade on the bottom, DOES NOT stay connected to the motor body! Frustrating having to twist this together over and over again. Made a mess Too! Unfortunately, bought this in February 2017 and using it for first time in October. Would love to return this KitchenAid piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great had mixer, was a mother’s day gift and my mom loved it. The 2 speed motor does the job! Definitely worth a buy when on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: 110V not 220V
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm afraid I haven't gotten a chance to use it since I only realized it was 110V and not 220V compatible for Israel after it arrived. I had to have looked very very closely at the specifications to have known in time. You should try to highlight this since you are now shipping to Israel and Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Riki Vanunu

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do good job blending
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do good job blending, however the blending part comes apart too easily from the main body - frustrating to keep attaching it back while you are blending
customer_reviews.author: Anna Scuderi

customer_reviews.title: Fine for use in other bowls
customer_reviews.text: Not made for use in cup. Hand blendercreates suction in bottom of blender cup and makes it stick to blender blade creating a huge mess. Not functional as packaged. Fine for use in other bowls. Definitely not for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Prissy

customer_reviews.title: If unsatisfied, you have to pay to ship it back
customer_reviews.text: This blender looks so great, and the fact that it's made of metal means it originally won't break like so many plastic ones do. Of course, it also won't blend anything but the softest fruits and well boiled veggies. There just wasn't any power. The high speed is slow and disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Karots

customer_reviews.title: Works great for blending my cholesterol powder into juice
customer_reviews.text: Works great for blending my cholesterol powder into juice. I have not found anything else that will take the powdery taste away but this does the trick. Easy to clean and super fast mixing
customer_reviews.author: Seedling

customer_reviews.title: Makes yummy soup!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to blend the oil in natural peanut butter into a wonderfully smooth texture!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Almanrode

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the blender is two parts for ease in cleaning, unfortunately, the parts come unattached during use which makes it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey P

customer_reviews.title: Handy kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Way better than putting things into a blender, especially soup!
customer_reviews.author: lisa k.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blend great
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't work well. I may be using it in too big of a pan, but I got it to puree soups with out having to transfer in to my blender.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: As expected - arrived on time Love this thing! Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy
customer_reviews.text: Good cuality good price I used for everything really 👍
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mancio

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product for making smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that my KitchenAid hand blender KHB 1231 did not include the pan guard. How do I go about getting that?
customer_reviews.author: jillly

customer_reviews.title: Weak and Plastic
customer_reviews.text: My last immersion blender was Calphalon and I used it several times a week for years. Sadly they are no longer available. I tried the Kitchen Aid. It's not nearly as powerful and it seems cheaply made. It will wear out soon and I'll spend more next time for a higher quality device.
customer_reviews.author: Rebe_J

customer_reviews.title: Immersion Blender
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love that the "head" is removable for easy cleaning. You can get you cleaning cloth in around the blade. With others, you were only able to stick the head in the water and swish it around to clean. I'm very happy with this immersion blender.
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: This blender works very well and is fairly easy to clean, but I have to hold down the button the entire time it’s mixing. I wish it would automatically stay on because the button is hard to hold
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Selby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for your travel needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I travel a lot and needed something to mix my morning protein drink - it works great. Very powerful, so I know I can mix anything with it, and easy to break-down for packing.
customer_reviews.author: MHC

customer_reviews.title: good price! I haven't used the smoothie cup yet
customer_reviews.text: very handy! good price! I haven't used the smoothie cup yet, but i'm sure it's handy for people who make them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: RYANG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blender
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people are saying theirs has broken, etc. but this blender is pretty awesome! It does its job and it does it well. Can’t beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't keep together
customer_reviews.text: The cleanable end does not lock into place well. It was frequently coming apart while trying to use it. We ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: David Keck

customer_reviews.title: Has replaced our traditional blender for most kitchen duties
customer_reviews.text: Great for making baby food and other kitchen duties. Easy to clean, take apart and store. The cord is long enough that we can use it on any part of the counter top, and the two speeds comes in handy. Although we have a traditional blender, we don't use it anymore since it's more bulky and a pain to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Paik

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: I've had no problems with this hand blender. It's sturdy and does exactly what I need it to do. Used it to make cream of zucchini soup and it worked perfectly. I have not encountered the problem with it falling apart like mentioned in other reviews. Once you lock it into place, I don't really see how it would fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Great small blender.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. It mixes and is super easy to clean without taking up too much space. The only thing I have found is that you have to be sure to move around in the pan. It will not make meringue is the only thing I have found that it does do.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Powerful and easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.author: israel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This blends and emulsified everything really well and it's actually very quiet on low speed. I would definitely recommend this hand blender to anyone looking for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectictwist

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic for making Mayonnaise!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is great, but it does come apart where the end and the handle comes together. Just don't "stir" while mixing and its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: It's just great for me! A true work horse for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: skr

customer_reviews.title: Handy and quick
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. I made a butternut squash soup at home and I was able to get it to my preferred consistency with very little fuss. The two speeds are marked on the top end of the stick for easy reading and the attachment was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Mieca J.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything is in the box
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good the only reason I get 3 stars is I didn't get measuring cup in my box which is on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to purchased this item. I did almost two gallons of gazpacho yesterday without peel the tomatoes and you don't even see the tomato skin. For this price is amazing how this blender performs. Perfect for home made mayonnaise. I'm gonna enjoy this product a lot with my Mediterranean cuisine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little thing
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, easy to use, many kitchen applications. Must have if you cook at home often.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this to make quiche bases, soups, and guacamole. It’s easy to use with very minimal setup.
customer_reviews.author: B V

customer_reviews.title: Updating previous review
customer_reviews.text: Initially I didn't like this because it kept detaching. But then i figured out that you have to click it on. You twist it until it's completely attached. To detach, twist off. Now I love it. It's powerful and stainless and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: No cover
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the cover shown in pictures. The holes on the shield of blender makes it hard to clean and blend. I think Brains are better
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand blender!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little hand blender for making my own chai, and this is great. I'm sure it will come in handy for making soups as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Trojanowski

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: It works great but I don't use often. I bought a Vitamix and it is my go to blender.
customer_reviews.author: MullMD

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This KitchenAid's 2 Speed Immersion Blender's powerful DC motor provides long-lasting, controlled hand blending, ideal for blending soups and crushing ice drinks. It includes an 8" removable stainless steel shaft with bell, is dishwasher safe and can be used in shallow or deep pots and pitchers. The ability to disassemble makes it convenient for storing and allows portability, and the soft grip handle is non-slip and designed for comfortable handling while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ghazal El Bar

customer_reviews.title: Handle doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: The handle comes off every few seconds. I make sure to click it into place, but it still comes off almost immediately. I have to hold it on, which is awkward and not ideal at all
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet motor
customer_reviews.text: Got this and just using the motor. The 2 speeds are perfect. Runs smooth very useful with plenty of power
customer_reviews.author: heyRalph

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job but it does come apart when using which is annoying. Hard to hold the cup and keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kaio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the blender other than the 2 pieces come apart about 10 times per use. Not interlocking.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Powerful and easy to clean. Haven't used the blending jar yet as I first used this to blend soup.
customer_reviews.author: Corellianjedi2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: works great, I used to use a blender to puree, this is so much easier and I do it right in the pot I cook in
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our 6 & 8 quart pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this model
customer_reviews.text: After 4, 1-2 minutes uses blending shaft keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: A r

customer_reviews.title: good price and works well for soups.
customer_reviews.text: my husband makes soup alot, so he's the one using this and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: grrrrin ky

customer_reviews.title: nice blender and powerful
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd one as the blades dulled on the first one. (it lasted 2 years) very worth it and I use it 6 times a week! very powerful as I use it with fruit and ice in my shakes... Cleans up well. For the price it is one of the best out there!
customer_reviews.author: capengin11

customer_reviews.title: Junk, just like everyone says!
customer_reviews.text: The handle comes off during blending. LOL what the heck? Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! No more big blender or hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tressler

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke after second use. Gear is made of plastic so bound to break. Then I missed my return window so it’s trash.
customer_reviews.author: daniel matz

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Best hand blender I have used, this one can handle a full pot of soup where my first one burned out after two minutes of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Anne

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Hand Blender, 2-Speed, Contour Silver
product_meta.description: The KitchenAid KHB1231CU 2-Speed Hand Blender in Contour Silver comes equipped with a 3-cup BPA-free jar and lid and a DC motor that blends, purees and crushes quietly and powerfully. With two speeds, the hand blender quietly and powerfully blends, purees and crushes a variety of foods. The premium stainless steel blending attachment reaches an 8-inch immersion depth. The one touch power button and soft grip handle provide comfort and convenience.
feature_bullets: The Removable 8" Blending Arm with Fixed Blade locks into the motor body for easy operation.
The stainless steel S-shaped fixed blade quickly blends ingredients for smoothies, milk shakes, soups or baby food.
The soft grip handle offers a non-slip and comfortable grip when continuously blending ingredients.Power Cord Length:5.0
The 3-Cup BPA-Free Blending Jar with Lid is convenient for individual blending jobs, to serve or store for later. Top-rack dishwasher safe.
